page.title: 01MILVERTON VILLAGE
page.content:
MILVERTON IS QUITE PEACEFUL. THE TREES RUSTLE. THE BIRDS SING. CHILDREN PLAY.
THE FIELDS IN MILVERTON ARE QUITE HILLY. THE SOIL IS SOFT, AND WE HAVE GOOD CROPS. THERE ARE LOTS OF APPLE TREES, AND LOTS OF TREES TO CLIMB TOO.
THE HOUSES ARE MOSTLY MADE OF BRICK. THE VERY OLD HOUSES ARE MADE OF STONES. THE HOUSES THAT ARE MADE OF STONES ARE DOWN LITTLE LANES OR AT THE BACK OF HOUSES.
THERE ARE TWO PUBS IN MILVERTON, THE GLOBE AND THE WHITE HART. THEY ARE VERY GRAND LOOKING THINGS. THE SHOPS ARE SMALL, BUT SELL A LOT OF THINGS. THERE ARE QUITE A FEW SHOPS. THE CHURCH LIES AT THE TOP OF A HILL OVERLOOKING THE VILLAGE.
